review: V good experience. Abhishek conducts the whole hair replacement procedure which is a big task in a optimal and empathic way so that the patient is comfortable as much as possible.Also the cost is most reasonable and he is supported by a good team of technicians.
reply_text: Thank you for ur valuable feedback...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******** ******* ** ****** ************** ** ****** ***** *********** ** *** ******** . In the guise of reasonable treatment, he will make you undergo 8 hr of surgery and does not perform treatment per his commitment. I incurred an expense of 90k **** ********** ******* ******* ****** . Followed all the guidance and precaution *** ** ******* I underwent 8hrs of surgery with more than 10k needle shots *** **** ** ******* ******* **** ******* ** ***** ******** ****** *** ******** ** ******. I followed up by traveling 3 hours to reach his hospital and doctor along with his wife fought with me. ******** ***** ****** ** ************* ************** *** *********** Your money will be wasted if you see Dr. Abhishek Chauhan for hair transplant. Please save urself!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had consulted dr Abhishek for  an implant supported Denture case for my mother who is 70 years old. Doctor Abhishek and his team were very efficient and the entire ecosystem at Sharan hospital is very well designed to efficiently cater to patients. He was very patient with all our naive queries, was very knowledgeable and guided us with great care right from choosing the right denture to getting the implant in place. He would stretch beyond his consulting hours to personally tweak the denture and ensuring my mother tried it multiple times until she was completely satisfied with the fit. He showed great care and love as he dealt with this elderly patient. My mother was very happy with his behaviour and care . I would highly recommend consulting Dr Abhishek. *** ** *** **** ******** * **** *** ** ******************
